vendor_name: Castello Boutique Suites By The Sea
title: Grand Opening: Crete Adults-Only Pool Suite Opulence with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Be one of the first to experience oceanside opulence in the heart of one of Crete’s most spectacular coastal towns at this brand-new, adults-only and all-suite luxury retreat. Perfectly positioned between Sissi’s sun-kissed hills and the eternal Aegean Sea - featuring an architecture-led design that’s equal parts Art Deco and Olympus - this serene stay has everything you need to kick back for a leisurely time in the sun.

After days spent exploring Sissi’s waterside tavernas, markets and village bakeries, return to enjoy cocktails by your suite’s private pool, or indulge with stuffed vine leaves, Cretan lamb shanks and Greek desserts at Origins Restaurant.
